citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on
5/20/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone, using the two numbers on file. An email was also
sent to the two email addresses on file. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Alexandra Calderon, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
